name: TECH DEMO: Pulse Forge VR
description: TECH DEMO: Pulse Forge VR – get the highest score in your favourite music by destroying everything. Forge your own map for music destruction! In this game you can use your favourite musics to create/generate your own fully playable map, where you can destroy boxes to the beat and show that you are best in your favourite music. In the future game is also going to contain its own build in musics with treasures to unlock.
